headline: Bernstein Raises PPG Industries (PPG) PT to $130, Cites Revenue Beat Despite Q4 Earnings Miss
summary: PPG Industries Inc. (NYSE:PPG) is one of the most undervalued quality stocks to buy right now. On January 30, Bernstein increased the price target for PPG Industries to $130 from $123 while keeping its Outperform rating. The firm observed that PPG Industries’ Q4 2025 results were well received by the market despite missing EPS expectations, […]
